channel.title: Project-Nex!
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]We are currently looking for YOU![/b][/size]
[center]Base(s): optimusscape and disturbed [hr] Base [/center]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7122/6909626856_266ab79d8e_b.jpg[/img][/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Section 3[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]Section 4[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Applying Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit/Section 7[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Welcome to project-nex. We think you should apply now because of we want a great team! What we made: - Some shops - Some more people who tele's you to other places like falador,varrock - Vannaka who tele's you to training spots - Better xp rate for all skills - Teleport with ;;home - Skilling area's - Train area(currently working on) - Trade fix(currently working on) - Hiscores(currently working on) - Vote for cash(will be worked on later) - Auto-Donate system(will be worked on later) - 711 cache
so we need some help!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] We are a great group of friends and now we are looking for someone who can help us with making some more things, because some of the people don't have that much time, we are inspired to making a RSPS because i played chaoticprod, a 317 server, they quitted making it cuz of a bug, so i bought it and fixed it, there won't be many people who knows about chaoticprod but it was a great community and a lot of fun, so i took over the server, took some time but it worked, took over some off the staff, but i forgot to think of myself... So then came the end of Chaoticprod, then i was looking for something better, i was making a 639 (torvas nightmare) and there came a end of when the website and vps were hacked by a irl [s]friend[/s] so now we are working on a 667 and i can say it isn't that easy but yea we are looking forward to have a great community like we had on Chaoticprod!
- Thanks -
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Section 3 (Suggested Topic Readers Want to Know After Reading Topic 2: Our Aim)[/b][/size] As i said above our aim is that we get a great community but we want a great coding team too!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]4.0 - Section 4 Donations System[/b][/size] Our donate systems are: OneBip and PayPal. We will split all the profit over all staff, depending on what u did the month, u get your cash over PayPal and OneBip, dutch people living in Noord-Holland can get their cash if they come to me. People who live in the Netherlands can be paid with iDeal too!
We are using Dropbox, Skype, MSN, Remote Control, PayPal and OneBip.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=appliying]5.0 - The Applying Layout[/b][/size]
Here is the layout:
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Age?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester, database maker): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Any projects you worked on?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code] [ul][center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Entertainers:
[b]0/3[/b]
Open Open Open
Coders:
[b]0/7[/b]
Mickie456 Jaffacakes Twinkel Star Open Open Open Open
Suggestors:
[b]0/2[/b]
Open Open
Testers:
[b]0/8[/b]
mickie456 twinkel star jaffacakes bowlofcereal Open Open Open Open [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7.0 - Credits/Section 7[/b][/size]
[b]Matrix team[/b] Contribution [b]Disturbed team[/b] Contribution [b]Optimusscape team[/b] Contribution
---
Thanks for looking to our server!
---
Media: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/agil.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/cache%2Bbonus.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/fishing.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/lummy_sage.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/mine%2Bsmith_zone.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/shops.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/skillcape_shop.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/thieving.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/project-nex/Vannaka.png[/img][/center][/ul]

item.title: Project-Nex!
item.dc:creator: @Austinrauk Austinrauk
item.description:
@Austinrauk wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:Austin/Austin
Age?:18
E-mail address?austinrauk21@hotmail.com
What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester, database maker):
Entertainer(In Game I will host Hide and go Seak, and many other events threw out the game. on the forums side i will post video contests and reward them in game
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:bout a year can help out (basic codes)
Any projects you worked on?: Bandoscape, blackcube
What time zone are you in?:central
How long will you be on everyday?:5-6 hours
Why do you want to become part of this server?:Owner looks dedicated to server and looks like a strong running project
Any Suggestions?: None everything at the moment looks very good!
//Other Info Below Here\
I am very helpful, I keep a level head when playing and I can deal with people even when they dont respect me. I enjoy making people happy and have experience as an owner forum manager and admin. I do not beg for things I like to work hard with everything I do but most of all have fun along the way thanks for your time hope I can be a part of the team!

-Austin

Read full topic
